name: GetActorFacingAngle
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get the facing angle of an actor.

params_body.name: actorid
params_body.description: The ID of the actor to get the facing angle of. Returned by CreateActor.

params_body.name: &Float:ang
params_body.description: A float variable, passed by reference, in to which the actor's facing angle will be stored.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The actor specified does not exist.

 The actor's facing angle is stored in the specified variable.
related_fn:
SetActorFacingAngle: Set the facing angle of an actor.
 GetActorPos: Get the position of an actor.
